price: Sekali-kali tidak1564, sesungguhnya mereka pada hari itu benar-benar terhalang dari (melihat) Tuhan mereka.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّهُمۡ عَن رَّبِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لَّمَحۡجُوبُونَ
footnotes: 1564.  Maksudnya sekali-kali tidak seperti apa yang mereka katakan bahwa mereka dekat pada sisi Tuhan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kallā innahum ʿan rabbihim yawma-idhin lamaḥjūbūna
